nodes.text: Lanzarota Malco was a female human who lived on Savareen in the Pnakotic Coast village on the Pnakotic Coast. Her tongue was removed during a raid of the Crimson Dawn because her village tried to rise up against this criminal syndicate. She was responsible for supplying the village with energy and fresh water, which is why she supervised the maintenance of wind turbines and desalination vaporators. She was also present when Tobias Beckett's crew came to Savareen in 10 BBY to refine Coaxium that they had stolen from Kessel.
